  • Class
    Description
    InvalidRecipeException
    Thrown when a recipe being created, loaded, or executed is invalid.
    RecipeConditions
    Provides a complete condition-evaluation system used by CustomRecipes to validate whether a recipe is allowed to run at a given location and/or for a specific player.
    RecipeConditions.Block
     
    RecipeConditions.Block.TimeRange
     
    RecipeConditions.ConditionSet
    The full condition set for a recipe.
    RecipeUtil
    Utility manager and API entry point for creating, validating, and storing custom recipe definitions inside the CustomRecipes plugin.
    RecipeUtil.Ingredient
    Represents a single ingredient used in a recipe.
    RecipeUtil.Recipe
    Represents a fully defined custom recipe used by the CustomRecipes API.
